amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), add the following: LIMITATION ON FUNDS FOR SELECTUSA INITIATIVE SEC. ___. None of the funds made available in this Act may used to carry out the SelectUSA initiative.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to carry out the SelectUSA initiative.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A060) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 217 (Roll no. 242).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A060) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 217 (Roll no. 242).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A060) offered by Mr. Flake.
